english.segment1: Last night my shadow ran from me. It bowed its head in shame. I can't bear my reflection. I can't even write my name
english.segment2: Sometimes I choose to. Forget about You. Sometimes I choose to. Ignore the truth
english.segment3: Just like the man from chapter three. I tried to hide. From fleeting. Familiar. White light
english.segment4: Sometimes I choose to. Forget about You. Sometimes I choose to. Ignore the truth
english.segment5: How sweet the name. How sweet the face. That I long to touch. With dirty hands
english.segment6: I'm seeing sideways. Because I've fallen down again. And it's so hard to find my way
